page.seoDescription: Avoid the AgencyAnalytics 'growth tax'. Flipika offers unlimited reports with no per-client fees.
page.subtitle: Stop paying $15 per client. Switch to unlimited pricing.
page.painPointsSubtitle: Your success shouldn't cost you more.
page.costSubtitle: How much AgencyAnalytics will really cost you next year
page.migrationCtaDesc: Switch to Flipika and scale your agency without financial penalties.
page.benefitsSubtitle: Everything you need for professional Google Ads reporting
page.testimonialsSubtitle: Join hundreds of agencies who made the switch
page.useCasesSubtitle: Flipika adapts to all business types

speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: No more loading spinners. Your reports display in under a second, even with millions of rows of data.

realtime.title: Real-time Data
realtime.description: Your reports update automatically. No more manual refreshing or waiting for synchronization.

design.title: Premium Design
design.description: Professional reports with modern glassmorphism design that impresses your clients from first glance.

whitelabel.title: Complete White Label
whitelabel.description: Your logo, your colors, your custom domain. Flipika vanishes behind your brand.

ai.title: AI Insights
ai.description: Our AI analyzes your campaigns and automatically generates actionable recommendations.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: A dedicated team available via chat 7/7 to support you through your migration.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Shopping Ads
ecommerce.description: Track your Shopping Ads performance with detailed reports on products, categories, and ROAS by SKU. Perfect for online stores managing catalogs of thousands of references.

leadgen.title: B2B Lead Generation
leadgen.description: Optimize your lead generation campaigns with reports that track the complete journey: from click to qualified conversion. CRM integrations available.

agency.title: Marketing Agencies
agency.description: Manage multiple clients from a single interface. Automated reports, complete white label, and integrated billing for an optimized agency workflow.

local.title: Local Businesses
local.description: Track your local campaigns (Google Maps, calls, directions) with geolocated metrics. Perfect for franchises and multi-location networks.

saas.title: SaaS & Software
saas.description: Track your complete acquisition funnel: free trials, paid conversions, LTV. Integrations with Stripe, Paddle, and major SaaS tools.

step1.title: Import Your Clients
step1.description: Connect your Google Ads Manager (MCC) account and import all client accounts in one click.

step2.title: Apply Your Themes
step2.description: Recreate your AgencyAnalytics branding in Flipika. Logo, colors, custom domain.

step3.title: Mass Automate
step3.description: Assign a master template to 50 clients at once. No need to configure accounts one by one anymore.

step4.title: Save Immediately
step4.description: From month one, see the billing difference. No more 'Extra Client' line items on your invoice.

time.title: The Per-Client Tax
time.description: AgencyAnalytics charges ~$15-20 per additional client. If you sign 10 new clients, your software bill goes up by $200/month. With Flipika, it's $0.

maintenance.title: The Cost of Add-ons
maintenance.description: Rank Tracker? Billed separately. Site Audit? Billed separately. At Flipika, all core marketing features are included in the base plan.

opportunity.title: Reduced Margin
opportunity.description: By paying per client, your margin shrinks on small accounts. Flipika allows you to remain profitable even on small Google Ads budgets.

testimonial1.quote: We loved AgencyAnalytics but the bill went up every month. Switching to Flipika saved us $4,000/year from year one, for an identical result.
testimonial1.author: Peter Durant

testimonial2.quote: Their pricing model punished us for growing. Flipika understood that agencies need predictable costs.
testimonial2.author: Sarah Connor

testimonial3.quote: The interface is just as clean as AgencyAnalytics, but the flexibility of Flipika slides is much better for custom client deliverables.
testimonial3.author: Luke Viera

tip1.title: Analyze Your Bill
tip1.description: Look at how much you're actually paying per client on AgencyAnalytics. The starting price is misleading.

tip2.title: Prepare Your Clients
tip2.description: Announce a 'reporting platform update' to your clients. Present the change as an experience improvement.

tip3.title: Recover SEO Data
tip3.description: If you use AgencyAnalytics Rank Tracker, remember to export your ranking histories before cutting access.

tip4.title: Test the Slide Editor
tip4.description: This is the big differentiator. Where AgencyAnalytics is rigid, Flipika allows for bespoke slides. Use it.

tip5.title: Configure Domain
tip5.description: Don't forget to set up your CNAME (reports.youragency.com) on Flipika so the transition is invisible.

tip6.title: Use Narrative Layer
tip6.description: AgencyAnalytics has basic widgets. Enable Flipika AI to automatically add analysis text.

tip7.title: Account Groups
tip7.description: Use Flipika portfolios to group clients by type (Ecom, Leadgen) and apply different reporting strategies.

faq.a1: Yes. Our business model is based on the value we bring to the agency, not a usage tax. You can have 10 or 100 clients, the base price stays the same.
faq.q2: Do you have SEO Rank Tracking?
faq.a2: We focus first on being the best at Paid Media (Google Ads). For SEO, we integrate Google Search Console for free. For advanced keyword tracking, specialized tools are often better and cheaper than an all-in-one.
faq.a3: It's simple because you already manage your clients via ad accounts. By connecting your MCCs, Flipika instantly recreates your account structure.
faq.a4: Yes, we aim for the same ease of use, but with more design flexibility. If you know how to use AgencyAnalytics, you'll know how to use Flipika in 5 minutes.
faq.a5: Of course. Each client can have their own secure, white-label portal, exactly like on AgencyAnalytics.
faq.a6: Meta Ads integration is coming in Q2 2026. For now, we are the ultimate tool for Google Ads agencies, but multi-channel is coming very fast.
faq.a7: None. You create your account and start. No hidden onboarding fees.
faq.a8: Yes, high-definition PDF and even editable Google Slides, which AgencyAnalytics doesn't always do well.
